description: Work Visa & Digital Nomad Visa (DNV). Note: DNV income threshold is 200% of SMI.

meta.min_funds_requirement: **Digital Nomad:** ~2,368 EUR/month (200% SMI). Add 75% SMI for spouse, 25% for child.

add.title: Work Authorization (Autorización de Trabajo)
add.description: Original resolution of the Work and Residence Authorization issued by the 'Oficina de Extranjería' in Spain.

add.title: Digital Nomad Evidence
add.description: Contracts showing remote work for >3 months. Company must be outside Spain. Income >200% SMI.

add.title: Social Security Certificate
add.description: Proof of Social Security coverage in home country (if applicable) or registration in Spain.

add.title: Medical Certificate
add.description: Certificate stating you are free from diseases under International Health Regulations 2005.

add.title: Police Clearance Certificate
add.description: PCC from countries lived in for the last 5 years, legalized and translated into Spanish.

steps_flow.title: Choose Path: Work Visa vs Digital Nomad
steps_flow.description:
**Work Visa:** Employer gets authorization.
**Digital Nomad:** Apply directly if you meet income/remote work criteria.

steps_flow.title: Employer Applies for Authorization (Work Visa only)
steps_flow.description: Your employer submits the application to the Provincial Aliens Office (Oficina de Extranjería).

steps_flow.title: Receive Authorization
steps_flow.description: Once approved, the employer sends you the resolution copy with the file number.

steps_flow.title: Book Appointment
steps_flow.description: Book a National Visa appointment at BLS International.

steps_flow.title: Submit Application
steps_flow.description: Submit documents including the Medical Certificate and PCC within 1 month of authorization.
